title: Engineering-Integrated Mathematics SCALE-UP Course for Adult Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic calculus and engineering physics concepts
context.additional_context: Establishing collaborative learning environments using digital devices (tablets/laptops)

learning_goals: Learners can integrate statics, dynamics, and multivariable calculus concepts for interdisciplinary problem-solving
Learners can conceptually analyze complex engineering problems through peer feedback and discussion, then express them as mathematical models
Learners perform SCALE-UP activity-based assessments targeting over 80% conceptual understanding achievement
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
